subtitle: A very easy recipe that requires no cooking.

method.text: Put the fruit into a non-metallic bowl. Mash gently with a potato masher to crush the fruit. Stir in the sugar and lemon juice.
Leave covered in a warm place for 1-1 days, or until the sugar has dissolved.
Spoon into small plastic containers. Seal, cover and label.

title: Cherry freezer jam
